import{useEffect,useState}from'react';import Card from'./components/card';import'./projetos.css';import Header from'./components/header';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Projetos(){// BUSCA AOS REPOSITORIOS DO GITHUB
